label: Standard Referral List
matchedOn: ZIP code, diagnosis category, insurance eligibility

recommendations.name: Valley Community Mental Health Center
recommendations.description: Comprehensive outpatient mental health services including individual therapy, group therapy, and medication management.
recommendations.cost: Accepts Medicaid, Medicare, and most private insurance

recommendations.name: Depression and Bipolar Support Alliance (DBSA) - Roanoke Chapter
recommendations.description: Peer-led support group for individuals living with depression or bipolar disorder. Open discussion format.
recommendations.location: First Presbyterian Church, 567 Church St, 2.8 miles away

recommendations.name: Roanoke Parks & Recreation - Adult Fitness Programs
recommendations.description: Various fitness classes including yoga, aerobics, and strength training for adults of all fitness levels.
